title: Azir bugs are never ending. Or Pantheon is just too manly.
body: In this patch, something must have been undone about Pantheon's interaction with Azir's ult. Previously, I'd be able to block him and knock him away from any type of way he'd enter (from ult/stunning/spearjab/spearthrow/etc.) now I can no longer block him or knock him up with Azir's ult under any circumstance. I know Azir is a bit buggy but I still love his design. If there would be a possible fix to this, that'd be great :D

replies.body: Thanks for the report. We're digging into Azir's ult at the moment - his ult's occasionally failling against enemies in general (this isn't just a Pantheon bug alas).

> Thanks for the report. We're digging into Azir's ult at the moment - his ult's ***occasionally*** failling against enemies in general (this isn't just a Pantheon bug alas).

As in 90% of the time?
Azir's ult is useless against wukong's dive.

Are you going to make an official statement about the new bugs with Azir?
This is literally all there is in terms of response from Riot. A reply in the balance forum, meanwhile the bug report forum is overflowing with reports about it.

And what are you planning to do? Remove him for over a week as with Nidalee and Kassadin? 
Hotfix him? Leave him open to be played with an ultimate which doesn't work and keep silent about it?
What about the AA bug that you guys "fixed" a while back?

Any chance of Azir's Q and W smartcasting being fixed?
Q makes you move close enough to send soldiers to your cursor, while W simply drops a soldier in the direction of your cursor. Seems like those should be switched, given that the soldiers are entirely useless if not dropped in the right location (it costs a fair amount of mana to Q them into autoattack position every time you want them at a specific location).
Sure would've been nice if Riot had done a little more due diligence with Azir before releasing him.  He's the buggiest thing I've ever seen in this game.

I eleventh the objections about Azir's continued bugginess.

As I did after each previous "we fixed some of Azir's bugs", I played a couple of games with him, and again died several times in each game when his Ult wall simply passed through a champion as if it were a hologram, as well as dying when trying to dash away using W-Q-E, because either W or E failed.

This is why Azir still has the reputation of being someone who will always feed and throw.

Someone mentioned smartcast...if I turn smartcast off, will Q and E start working consistently?

Oh, and that reminds me: How insane is it that we not only can't set up smartcast on a per-champion basis, but not even a per-account basis? Until my kids matured enough to recognize the value of smartcast, each of us was constantly having to remember to switch it when using the machine after someone else.
Yeah I tried ulting a low hp Kennen towards my team and he walked through it unscathed

Played with an Azir yesterday, and had one of his ult's bug out causing us to be Aced. Pretty frustrating. In this case we were fighting in the bushes around mid lane/river. I forget who the enemy champs were but at the time it seemed that the glitch may have been caused due to the fact that we were vacating the bushes as the ult fired, and so all of the enemy champs were coming at us from the fog of war. Pretty sure both Lee Sin and Jax leapt at us and ***THROUGH*** the Azir ult, and then Fiora simply walked through.
2 games now my azir's ult is failing most of the time  ....so many people hating on me  :'(
What do you mean by " too manly " , we talking about THE manliest man in the league {{champion:80}}
